name: Unnamed moskal-shooting Game
description:
Simple top-down shooter about shooting russians. What could be more enjoyable?

To-do list:

  • More enemies
  • More attacks
  • Progression (?)

Warning! The game is in active development and currently in beta version, so expect bugs. If you find any or you have any suggestions please tell us about them in the comment section. Also, macOS version doesn't work correctly at the moment, but we'll fix it.

If you have any complaints or suggestions, write them down in the comment section!

Made by Ukrainians in support of Ukraine

Main menu music by White Bat

In-game music by Metaphazik
